popover.primary: A mastery path focused on dealing damage to a single, far-away enemy.
popover.secondary: Bow counts 100% of its dps to abilities, sword counts 45%.

popover.primary: A mastery path focused on fighting in melee combat.
popover.secondary: Sword counts 100% of its dps towards abilities.

popover.primary: A mastery path focused on fighting multiple enemies at medium range.
popover.secondary: Bow counts 100% of its dps to abilities, sword counts 45%.

data.name: Assault Stance
data.description:
A close-combat stance which increases your Strength and Weapon Skill by 120, and increases your Armor by the same amount that you receive from items.
While in Assault Stance; your Ballistic Skill from items will also count towards your Strength, your Ranged Power from items will also count towards your Melee Power, and your Ranged Critical chance from items will also count towards your Melee Critical chance.You may only use a single Stance at a time.

data.name: Bend the Winds
data.description: Increases your Elemental resistance by 252.

data.name: Blood-Soaked War
data.description: Any time you kill an enemy, you will instantly regain 321 health.

data.name: Bullseye
data.description: Whenever you critically hit an enemy, your chance to critically hit is increased by 20% for 5 seconds, but you also become 10% more vulnerable to being critically hit.

data.name: Centuries of Training
data.description: Upon striking a target with a direct damage ability there is a 25% chance to inflict an additional 252 Spirit damage over 3 seconds.

data.name: Clever Recovery
data.description:
If an enemy dodges any of your attacks, you will regain 75 Action Points.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Concealment
data.description: With luck and experience you are able to Dodge all ranged attacks and Disrupt all magic attacks against you for 7 seconds.

data.name: Discerning Offense
data.description: Your attacks have a 10% reduced chance to be defended against.

data.name: Distracting Rebounds
data.description: Distracting Shot will now also affect any other enemies within 20 feet of your initial target.

data.name: Distracting Shot
data.description: You Detaunt your target, making them hate you less and causing them to deal only 50% damage to you for 15 seconds. If you attack anyone that you have Detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Expert Skirmisher
data.description: Your cast times are reduced to 50% when you are within 20 feet of your target.

data.name: Explosive Shots
data.description:
All of your ranged attacks will explode for the next 10 seconds, dealing 300 damage to all enemies within 20 feet of your target.
This effect will not trigger more than once every second.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any silencing, disarming, rooting, snaring effects and your abilities will build 50% faster and may not be set back.

data.name: Hail of Doom
data.description: You focus on a spot on the ground, shooting arrows at that spot every 0.5 seconds for 5 seconds, hitting all enemies within 20 feet of that area for 300 damage as long as you maintain your concentration.

data.name: Hunter's Fervor
data.description: An inspired ferver fills your group, increasing AP regeneration by 20% for 15 seconds to all groupmates within 100 feet of you.

data.name: Instill Fear
data.description: You deal 1200 damage to all enemies within 30 feet and staggers the target for up to 9 seconds, preventing all actions unless they are damaged.

data.name: Instinctive Aim
data.description: Increases your Strength, Ballistic Skill, and Weapon Skill by 138, but reduces your Toughness by 138.

data.name: Leading Shots
data.description: Any time you critically hit with a ranged attack, the chance to critically hit will be increased by 15% for 10 seconds for group members within 100 feet, but this will not affect you.

data.name: Lileath's Forgiveness
data.description: Removes all Hexes, Curses, Cripples, and Ailments from you.  You regain 250 Action Points.

data.name: Masterful Aim
data.description: Increases your Ballistic Skill by 160.

data.name: Pierce Defenses
data.description: If an enemy blocks, dodges, or parries any of your attacks, their chances to block, dodge, and parry will be reduced by 15% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Point-Blank
data.description: A mid-range attack that deals 600 damage and knocks targeted player away. Monsters will be knocked down.

data.name: Replenishing Strikes
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy, you will regain 40 Action Points. Tactic can not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Scout Stance
data.description:
A long-distance bow stance that increases your Ballistic Skill and Initiative by 80 and the range of your bow attacks by 10%.

You may only use a single Stance at a time.

data.name: Skirmish Stance
data.description:
A close-range bow stance that increases your Toughness by 80 and the chance that your bow attacks will critically hit by 5%. You gain the ability to autoattack while moving while in this stance.

You may only use a single Stance at a time.

data.name: Smoldering Arrows
data.description: Flame Arrow's damage over time is increased to 471 damage.

data.name: Steady Aim
data.description: For the next 6 seconds, all of your abilities that do damage will have a 50% higher chance to critically hit, but will take an additional 1.5 seconds to build up.

data.name: Vengeance of Nagarythe
data.description: You are filled with a desire for vengeance, increasing all damage you deal by 25% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Whirling Pin
data.description: All enemies within 30 feet become snared, reducing movement speed by 40% for the next 10 seconds. You are knocked back away from your enemies.

data.name: Whirling Rage
data.description: Deals 1600 damage to all enemies within 30 feet.

data.name: Wrist Slash
data.description: Grim Slash will now reduce your enemy's Weaponskill by 120 and Initiative by 80 for 20 seconds, and increase your Weaponskill and Initiative by the same amount.

data.name: Guerrilla Training
data.description: Reduces the action point costs of all abilities within the Path Of The Scout by 35%.

data.name: Eye Shot
data.description: A Crippling shot that deals 216 damage and reduces your target's Initiative by 50 for 20 seconds. This ability will continue to build up even if you move.

data.name: Enchanted Arrows
data.description: Flame Arrow and Festering Arrow will now bypass all of your victim's resistances.

data.name: Festering Arrow
data.description: Deals 658 Corporeal damage to your target.

data.name: No Quarter
data.description: Eagle's Eye now builds up 1 seconds faster, but the cost is increased by 20 Action Points.

data.name: Fell The Weak
data.description: Deals 1198 damage if your target is below 20% hit points, or 586 damage otherwise.

data.name: Rain of Steel
data.description: You repeatedly shoot arrows at the ground for 10 seconds, dealing 146 damage every second to all enemies within 20 feet of that spot.

data.name: Sinister Assault
data.description: Brutal Assault will now bypass all of the target's armor.

data.name: Swift Strikes
data.description: You unleash a punishing series of attacks on your enemy for up to 3 seconds, striking them twice per second and dealing 79 damage per hit.  If the target is building up an ability, then your strikes will deal 142 damage instead.  This ability will end if you break your concentration or run out of action points.

data.name: No Respite
data.description: Your damage is increased by 15% when under 45 feet away from your target.

data.name: Merciless Soldier
data.description: Reduces the action point costs of all abilities within the Path Of Assault by 35%.

data.name: Exploit Weakness
data.description: A Crippling attack which deals 252 damage and knocks down your target for 3 seconds.

data.name: Split Arrows
data.description: Spiral-Fletched Arrow now hits all enemies within 20 feet of your initial target, but does 30% less damage.

data.name: Flame Arrow
data.description: An Ailment which deals 169 Elemental damage to your target and then explodes, dealing an additional 267 Elemental damage over 9 seconds to the target and all other enemies within 20 feet of them.

data.name: Keen Arrowheads
data.description: Increases the durations of Broadhead Arrows to 21 seconds, Takedown to 15 seconds, and Eye Shot to 25 seconds.

data.name: Shadow Sting
data.description: An Ailment which deals 498 damage to your target over 9 seconds and causes all healing effects used on them to become 50% weaker.  Only usable on a target that is already Ailing.

data.name: Powerful Draw
data.description: Increases the maximum range of all Path Of The Skirmisher attacks by 50%.

data.name: Barrage
data.description: Deals 278 damage to all enemies in an arc in front of you, up to 40 feet away.

data.name: Penetrating Arrow
data.description: Deals 800 damage to all enemies in front of you, up to 40 feet away, and an additional 800 damage over 10 seconds.

data.name: Throat Shot
data.description: A Crippling shot that deals 266 damage and silences your target for 4 seconds, making them unable to use magic.

data.name: Rapid Fire
data.description:
You move with blinding speed as you quickly fire several shots at your target, dealing 97 damage to the enemy twice per second for up to 3 seconds. This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of a ction points.
If you are Vengeful, then the shots will deal 10% more damage.

data.name: Eagle Eye
data.description: A well aimed arrow that deals 354 damage.

data.name: Acid Arrow
data.description: An attack which deals 241 damage and reduces your target's armor by 618 and reduces their chance to block by 10% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Glass Arrow
data.description: Deals 579 damage to your target and reduces range on their abilities to 75% for the next 3 seconds.

data.name: Opportunistic Strike
data.description: A Crippling attack that deals 202 damage and disarms your target for 4 seconds, making them unable to use melee or ranged weapons.

data.name: Grim Slash
data.description: Deals 202 damage to your target.

data.name: Draw Blood
data.description: An Ailment which deals 468 damage over 9 seconds.

data.name: Sweeping Slash
data.description: Deals 209 damage to all enemies in an arc in front of you, up to 25 feet away.

data.name: Counterstrike
data.description: A quick strike which deals 127 damage to your target and interrupts any ability that they were building up.

data.name: Brutal Assault
data.note:
Target must be facing away from you
Requires Scout or Assault Stance
data.description: Deals 277 damage to your target, and makes monsters hate you less than normal.  Only usable when you are behind the target.If you are Vengeful, then this attack may be used from any position.

data.name: Takedown
data.description: An Ailment which deals 566 damage and snares your target, reducing their run speed by 40% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Spiral-Fletched Arrow
data.description: Deals 216 damage to your target. This ability will continue to build up even if you move.

data.name: Lileath's Arrow
data.description: A piercing arrow which deals 285 damage to all enemies in front of you, up to 65 feet away.  This ability will continue to build up even if you move.

data.name: Flanking Shot
data.note:
Requires Skirmish Stance
Target must be facing away from you
data.description:
Deals 636 damage to your target. This ability will continue to build up even if you move. Only usable from behind the target.
The critical chance of the ability is increased by the percentage of life lost on the enemy target.

data.name: Broadhead Arrow
data.description: An Ailment which deals 760 damage to your target over 15 seconds.

data.name: Aethyric Insight
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Daemon monsters, and take 5% less damage from them.  As long as you are attacking an enemy of this type, you gain Morale 25% faster.

data.name: Aethyric Pandemonium
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Daemon monsters.

data.name: Aethyric Ward
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Daemon monsters, and take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Apotheosis of Flesh
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Magical Beast, Dragonoid, and Forest Spirit monsters.

data.name: Apotheosis of Mind
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Magical Beast, Dragonoid, and Forest Spirit monsters, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.  As long as you are attacking a monster of this type, your abilities will cool down 2 seconds faster.

data.name: Apotheosis of Spirit
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Magical Beast, Dragonoid, and Forest Spirit monsters, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.

data.name: Benediction of Morr
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Undead monsters.

data.name: Benediction of the Dead
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Undead monsters, and take 5% less damage from them.  As long as you are attacking a monster of this type, your abilities will cool down 2 seconds faster.

data.name: Benediction of Winters
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Undead monsters, and take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Boon of Persistence
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Dwarf, Elf, or Human monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.  You will gain 50% more experience from these enemies.

data.name: Boon of Tenacity
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Dwarf, Elf, or Human monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.

data.name: Boon of the Impalpable
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Dwarf, Elf, or Human monster before it will attack you.

data.name: Cunning Assault
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Skaven monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%.

data.name: Cunning Evasion
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Skaven monsters by 5%.

data.name: Cunning Stratagem
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Skaven monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%.  You will gain 50% more experience from these enemies.

data.name: Favour of the Gods
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Beastmen monsters by 5%, and you take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Favour of the Mad
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Beastmen monsters by 5%, and you take 5% less damage from them.  As long as you are attacking a monster of this type, your abilities will cool down 2 seconds faster.

data.name: Favour the Daemonic
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Beastmen monsters by 5%.

data.name: Harrier's Ken
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Animal monster before it will attack you, and you take 5% less damage from them. You will gain 50% more experience from these enemies.

data.name: Harrier's Pelt
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Animal monster before it will attack you, and you take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Harrier's Savagery
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Animal monster before it will attack you.

data.name: Outmaneuver the Clever
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Greenskin monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.  As long as you are attacking an enemy of this type, you gain Morale 25% faster.

data.name: Outmaneuver the Cunning
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Greenskin monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.

data.name: Outmaneuver the Dim
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Greenskin monster before it will attack you.

data.name: Sky Titan's Bulwark
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Ogre, Troll, and Giant monsters by 5%.

data.name: Sky Titan's Favor
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Ogre, Troll, and Giant monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%.

data.name: Sky Titan's Strength
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Ogre, Troll, and Giant monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%.  As long as you are attacking an enemy of this type, you gain Morale 25% faster.

data.name: Diminish War Engine
data.note: Not usable on Siege Rams or Oil
data.description: Siege Targetted debuff. Decreases damage done by that siege engine to 98% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Hamper War Engine
data.note: Not usable on Siege Rams or Oil
data.description: Siege Targetted debuff. Increases the cooldown times of that siege engine by 50% for 10 seconds

data.name: Bolster War Engine
data.note: Not usable on Siege Rams or Oil
data.description: Siege Targetted buff. Increases damage done by that siege engine by 2% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Unshakable Focus
data.description: A cold unyielding focus causes all your attacks to deal 100% more damage for 7 seconds.

data.name: Outrider Patrol
data.description: Arrows strike the ground at a spot you select, dealing 1200 damage to all enemies within 20 feet of that spot.
